goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution
target_name: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
un_designated_tier: Tier I
data_footnotes:
Number of premature deaths (Attributable deaths): Number of deaths that occurred before the statistically average life expectancy was reached.
• Cardiopulmonary: relating to the heart and lungs.
• Short-term exposure to particulate matter: mortality due to acute respiratory diseases (children < 5 years): Number <1.
page_content:
In progress
A suitable data source has been identified. The corresponding time series are currently being processed to be included in this reporting platform.
